title: 新会员什么的
author: Creeper娘控
txt_content:
I have just found that the vip was not the Watcher~
刚刚才发现论坛的“欢迎新会员"不是仰视仰望了
会员到底是什么啊？

replies.author: 陳焌傑
replies.txt_content:
剛才加入mcbbs的賬戶lolz
the person who just add in mcbbs

replies.txt_content: you can you up， no can no bb
